Package net.kemitix.mon.tree

Interface Tree<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the objects help in the tree
All Superinterfaces:
Functor<T,​Tree<?>>
public interface Tree<T> extends Functor<T,​Tree<?>>
A tree of objects.
Author:
Paul Campbell (pcampbell@kemitix.net)

      Create a new generalised tree to hold object of a type.

      Parameters:
      item - the item for the tree node

    • item

      Maybe<T> item()
      Return the item within the node of the tree, if present.
      Returns:

    • count

      default int count()
      Count the number of item in the tree, including subtrees.
      Returns:
      the sum of the subtrees, plus 1 if there is an item in this node
